MIMIIROSE

Introduction

Hyori is a South Korean singer under Pocket7 Entertainment.

On September 1, 2022, Hyori was revealed as a member of the girl group mimiirose under YES IM Entertainment. They debuted on September 16, 2022, with the single "AWESOME".

On November 21, 2023, it was announced that mimiirose had parted ways with YES IM Entertainment following a mutual decision and that they were in talks of signing with a new agency.

On March 26, 2024, it was announced that mimiirose had signed an exclusive contract with Pocket7 Entertainment, continuing their activities as a group with the addition of two new members.
